  6    @brief   VSIPL++ Library: Correlation class [signal.correl].

  9#ifndef VSIP_CORE_SIGNAL_CORR_HPP
 10#define VSIP_CORE_SIGNAL_CORR_HPP
 11
 12/***********************************************************************
 13  Included Files
 14***********************************************************************/
 15
 16#include <vsip/support.hpp>
 17#include <vsip/domain.hpp>
 18#include <vsip/vector.hpp>
 19#include <vsip/matrix.hpp>
 20#include <vsip/core/signal/types.hpp>
 21#include <vsip/core/profile.hpp>
 22#include <vsip/core/signal/corr_common.hpp>
 23#if !VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 24# include <vsip/opt/signal/corr_ext.hpp>
 25# include <vsip/opt/signal/corr_opt.hpp>
 26# ifdef VSIP_IMPL_CBE_SDK
 27#  include <vsip/opt/cbe/cml/corr.hpp>
 28# endif
 29#endif
 30#if VSIP_IMPL_HAVE_CVSIP
 31# include <vsip/core/cvsip/corr.hpp>

 34/***********************************************************************
 35  Declarations
 36***********************************************************************/
 37
 38#if !VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 39
 40namespace vsip_csl
 41{
 42namespace dispatcher
 43{
 44template <dimension_type D,
 45          support_region_type R,
 46          typename T,
 47          unsigned int N,
 48          alg_hint_type H>
 49struct List<op::corr<D, R, T, N, H> >
 50{
 51  typedef Make_type_list<be::cml, be::opt, be::cvsip, be::generic>::type type;
 52};
 53
 54} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
 55} // namespace vsip_csl
 56
 57#endif
 58
 59namespace vsip
 60{
 61
 62template <template <typename, typename> class ConstViewT,
 63	  support_region_type                 Supp,
 64	  typename                            T = VSIP_DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE,
 65	  unsigned                            N_times = 0,
 66          alg_hint_type                       A_hint = alg_time>
 67class Correlation
 68  : public impl::profile::Accumulator<impl::profile::signal>,
 69#if VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 70    public impl::cvsip::Correlation<impl::Dim_of_view<ConstViewT>::dim,
 71                                    Supp, T, N_times, A_hint>
 72#else
 73    public vsip_csl::dispatcher::Dispatcher<
 74      vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::corr<impl::Dim_of_view<ConstViewT>::dim,
 75                                        Supp,
 76                                        T,
 77                                        N_times,
 78                                        A_hint> >::backend_type
 79#endif
 80{
 81  // Implementation compile-time constants.
 82private: 
 83  static dimension_type const dim = impl::Dim_of_view<ConstViewT>::dim;
 84
 85  typedef impl::profile::Accumulator<impl::profile::signal> accumulator_type;
 86
 87#if VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 88  typedef impl::cvsip::Correlation<dim, Supp, T, N_times, A_hint> base_type;
 89#else
 90  typedef typename 
 91  vsip_csl::dispatcher::Dispatcher<
 92    vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::corr<dim, Supp, T, N_times, A_hint> >::backend_type base_type;
 93#endif
 94
 95public:
 96  Correlation(Domain<dim> const&   ref_size,
 97	      Domain<dim> const&   input_size)
 98    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
 99      : accumulator_type(impl::signal_detail::Description<dim, T>::tag
100                         ("Correlation",
101                          impl::extent(input_size), impl::extent(ref_size)),
102                         impl::signal_detail::Op_count_corr<dim, T>::value
103                         (impl::extent(input_size), impl::extent(ref_size))),
104        base_type(ref_size, input_size)
105  {}
106
107  Correlation(Correlation const& corr) VSIP_NOTHROW;
108  Correlation& operator=(Correlation const&) VSIP_NOTHROW;
109  ~Correlation() VSIP_NOTHROW {}
110
111
112  // Accessors
113public:
114  support_region_type support() const VSIP_NOTHROW     { return Supp; }
115
116
117  // Correlation operators.
118public:
119  template <typename Block0,
120	    typename Block1,
121	    typename Block2>
122  Vector<T, Block2>
123  operator()(
124    bias_type               bias,
125    const_Vector<T, Block0> ref,
126    const_Vector<T, Block1> in,
127    Vector<T, Block2>       out)
128    VSIP_NOTHROW
129  {
130    typename accumulator_type::Scope scope(*this);
131
132    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
133    {
134      assert(ref.size(d) == this->reference_size()[d].size());
135      assert(in.size(d)  == this->input_size()[d].size());
136      assert(out.size(d) == this->output_size()[d].size());
137    }
138
139    impl_correlate(bias, ref, in, out);
140
141    return out;
142  }
143
144  template <typename Block0,
145	    typename Block1,
146	    typename Block2>
147  Matrix<T, Block2>
148  operator()(
149    bias_type               bias,
150    const_Matrix<T, Block0> ref,
151    const_Matrix<T, Block1> in,
152    Matrix<T, Block2>       out)
153    VSIP_NOTHROW
154  {
155    typename accumulator_type::Scope scope(*this);
156
157    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
158    {
159      assert(ref.size(d) == this->reference_size()[d].size());
160      assert(in.size(d)  == this->input_size()[d].size());
161      assert(out.size(d) == this->output_size()[d].size());
162    }
163
164    impl_correlate(bias, ref, in, out);
165
166    return out;
167  }
168
169  float impl_performance(char* what) const
170  {
171    if      (!strcmp(what, "mops"))  return this->mflops();
172    else if (!strcmp(what, "time"))  return this->total();
173    else if (!strcmp(what, "count")) return this->count();
174    else return this->base_type::impl_performance(what);
175  }
176};
177
178} // namespace vsip
179
180#endif // VSIP_CORE_SIGNAL_CORR_HPP
